page.title: 07CHANGING TIMES
page.content: of goods had increased greatly over the years.He also thought that there were too many foreign goods in the shops. He said that there were very few sports facilities in the area when he first came.Bowdon and Bowdon Vale {Cricket}Clubs and Bowdon{Croquet} Club have only been built in the last ten years.They are perhaps the only facilities in the area.He thought that there was nothing for young people in the Bowdon area.There was a plan put forward for a{youth club}in Bowdon,however, this failed to gain sufficient support from parents.
